movie.title: The Stand at Paxton County
movie.description_intro: U.S. Army combat medic, Janna Connelly is summoned home to help her estranged father after he suffers a heart attack. She discovers their once-pristine ranch now in disrepair and a local Sheriff with nefarious ties targeting local ranchers livestock. Janna now finds herself confronting her buried emotional past as she wages war against corrupt political forces. Inspired by the true events of Gary Dassinger, a Dickinson, ND rancher, and his 2017 fight to save his horses from government seizure.
movie.description_full: U.S. Army combat medic, Janna Connelly is summoned home to help her estranged father after he suffers a heart attack. Janna now finds herself confronting her buried emotional past as she wages war against corrupt political forces. Inspired by the true events of Gary Dassinger, a Dickinson, ND rancher, and his 2017 fight to save his horses from government seizure.

movies.title: Pay the Ghost
movies.summary: One year after Mike Lawford's young son disappeared during a Halloween carnival, he is haunted by ghostly images and terrifying messages he can't explain. Together with his estranged wife, he will stop at nothing to unravel the mystery and find their son-and, in doing so, he unearths the legend of the crying woman who refuses to remain buried in the past.

movies.title: Blood Is Blood
movies.summary: A young girl seeks revenge after an unexpected death, while the world around her unravels revealing horrifying secrets about her life and family.
movies.description_full: A young girl seeks revenge after an unexpected death, while the world around her unravels revealing horrifying secrets about her life and family.
movies.synopsis: A young girl seeks revenge after an unexpected death, while the world around her unravels revealing horrifying secrets about her life and family.

movies.title: American Animals
movies.summary: In this crime drama, four bright and well-off college students in Kentucky plot to steal some rare books from their university's Special Collections Library in a misguided quest for personal glory. Based on the story, the film includes interviews with the foursome who attempted the bizarre heist. Starring Barry Keoghan, Evan Peters, Blake Jenner, Jared Abrahamson and Ann Dowd.

movies.title: Monster
movies.summary: The true story of serial killer Aileen Wuornos who was convicted of luring men to their death and eventually executed in 2002. In 1989, she was working as a prostitute and finally makes a friend when she meets and begins a relationship with a young woman, Selby. Determined to straighten out her life, she tries to find legitimate work but with little education and limited social skills, she fails at every turn. She starts working as a hooker hitching rides along the local interstate highway and after robbing a few clients has an encounter with a vicious client whom she kills in self-defense. After that however she just takes to killing clients taking their money and car. Once arrested she claims self-defense but is eventually convicted.
